articles.description: Hamilton wildlife manager Blake Moynes was chosen by The Bachelorette's Katie Thurston on Monday night on the 17th season of the American reality show to become the first Canadian to get the final rose.

articles.description: American tourists returned to the Niagara Region for the first time in more than a year on Monday, eager to see the thundering falls, take in the area's attractions and explore nearby wine country.
